DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate efficacy safety rebamipide ophthalmic suspension subject dry eye syndrome .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Rebamipide Subjects With Dry Eye Syndrome
DOC.criteria: History dry eyerelated ocular symptom least 20 month . Meet protocoldefined criterion corneal conjunctival staining . Meet protocoldefined criterion ocular discomfort . Active anterior segment ocular disease dry eye syndrome . Inability suspend use topical ophthalmic medication throughout duration study . Inability suspend use contact lenses duration study . Judged investigator ineligible study past concurrent systemic disease , safety concern . Received investigational product within 4 month screen visit .
